name: Jet Battle 2017
description:
The most amusing horizontal Aircraft Combats ever in history comes to hit! It is a master’s refined craftsmanship with premium game engines plus fantasticsceneries, all of which will surely make you irresistibly fall in love with this game.

You are about to drive a paramountbomber to soar above mountains and traverse oceans, striking the villains who once hurt you with your game engines. As they are cruel and unbridled, bombs and napalm are the best gifts for them. They will learn that the patriot missiles are no joke. The noise of your bomber’s engine will resonate over the Mediterranean. Fear nothing, for your flag, your honor and your medals are powers to spur on you to move forward. Remember your oath: those who have invaded me will certainly be slain despite the distance!

Features of the game:

1.Virtual keys are forged by masters by using next generation game engines, overthrowing your knowledge for games.
2.There are no ads or charged items in the game but purest enjoyment.
3.Superb sceneries are found in the game, drafted by senior artists with great devotion.
4.Super impressive bombing sound effect grants you personal experience of what are mountains falling andthe earth splitting.
